thing-type.label: Trane XR524 Touchscreen Comfort Control Thermostat
thing-type.description: Touchscreen Comfort Control Thermostat<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Trane 524 Touchscreen Comfort Control is compatible with single and multistage forced air systems, including:</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtGas furnace systems</li&gt <li&gtOil furnace systems</li&gt <li&gtElectric furnace systems</li&gt <li&gtHeat pump systems</li&gt <li&gtAir conditioning systems</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPress MENU on the 524 Control.</li&gt <li&gtPress NEXT to advance to the Z-WAVE menu.</li&gt <li&gtPress SELECT</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPress MENU on the 524 Control.</li&gt <li&gtPress NEXT to scroll to Z-WAVE screen then press SELECT.</li&gt <li&gtPress YES to exclude the control</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: System Type
parameter.description: System Type

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Fan Type
parameter.description: Fan Type

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Change Over Type
parameter.description: Change Over Type

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Units
parameter.description: Units

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Display Lock
parameter.description: Display Lock

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Minimum Off Time
parameter.description: Minimum Off Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets the minimum off time before another heating/cooling cycle can begin to provide compressor short cycle protection. The thermostat screen will display WAIT when minimum off time is being enforced.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Minimum Run Time
parameter.description: Minimum Run Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets the minimum run time before a heating/cooling cycle can turn off to prevent rapid cycling. Thermostat screen will display "Cool ON" or "Heat ON" while the minimum run time is being enforced.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Heating Delta Stage 1 ON
parameter.description: Heating Delta Stage 1 ON<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating starts.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Heating Delta Stage 1 OFF
parameter.description: Heating Delta Stage 1 OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 heating stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 1.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Heating Delta Stage 2 ON
parameter.description: Heating Delta Stage 2 ON<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 heating starts.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_15_1
parameter.label: 15: Heating Delta Stage 2 OFF
parameter.description: Heating Delta Stage 2 OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 heating stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 2.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_16_1
parameter.label: 16: Heating Delta Stage 3 ON
parameter.description: Heating Delta Stage 3 ON<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating starts.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: Heating Delta Stage 3 OFF
parameter.description: Heating Delta Stage 3 OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 3 heating stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 3</p&gt

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: Cooling Delta Stage 1 ON
parameter.description: Cooling Delta Stage 1 ON<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling starts.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_19_1
parameter.label: 19: Cooling Delta Stage 1 OFF
parameter.description: Cooling Delta Stage 1 OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 1 cooling stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 1.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_20_1
parameter.label: 20: Cooling Delta Stage 2 ON
parameter.description: Cooling Delta Stage 2 ON<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling starts.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_21_1
parameter.label: 21: Cooling Delta Stage 2 OFF
parameter.description: Cooling Delta Stage 2 OFF<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the delta from setpoint that stage 2 cooling stops. Stage 1 turns off at setpoint minus (-) Delta Stage 2.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_24_1
parameter.label: 24: H/C Delta
parameter.description: H/C Delta<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtSets the minimum separation between the heating and cooling setpoints. Attempts to lower the cooling below the heating setpoint by this amount will PUSH the heating setpoint down to maintain this separation. Same for setting the heating setpoint above the cooling setpoint, it will PUSH the cooling setpoint up to maintain this separation. <br /&gtSettings in F.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_25_1
parameter.label: 25: SetBack Mode
parameter.description: SetBack Mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt0 = No Setback, 1 = Setback, 2 if ESM</p&gt

parameter.name: config_29_1
parameter.label: 29: ESM Setpoint--Heating
parameter.description: ESM Setpoint--Heating<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtEnergy Saving Mode (ESM) Setpoints are the setpoints used when the Energy Saving Mode schedule is selected in the Schedule Mode screen (or via Z-Wave control). <br /&gtSetting in F.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_30_1
parameter.label: 30: ESM Setpoint--Cooling
parameter.description: ESM Setpoint--Cooling<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtEnergy Saving Mode (ESM) Setpoints are the setpoints used when the Energy Saving Mode schedule is selected in the Schedule Mode screen (or via Z-Wave control).</p&gt

parameter.name: config_75_1
parameter.label: 75: Fan ON Time
parameter.description: Fan ON Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe fan cycler function cycles the HVAC system fan for an ON period followed by an OFF period continuously. Used to provide minimum air ventilation requirements. </p&gt <p&gtWhen the Fan ON time is set to a value greater than 0, an additional Cycler Fan mode is present when pressing the FAN button on the thermostat.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_76_1
parameter.label: 76: Fan OFF Time
parameter.description: Fan OFF Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe fan cycler function cycles the HVAC system fan for an ON period followed by an OFF period continuously. Used to provide minimum air ventilation requirements.</p&gt <p&gtWhen the Fan ON time is set to a value greater than 0, an additional Cycler Fan mode is present when pressing the FAN button on the thermostat.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_77_1
parameter.label: 77: 2nd Stage Heat Enable
parameter.description: 2nd Stage Heat Enable

parameter.name: config_78_1
parameter.label: 78: Aux Heat Enable
parameter.description: Aux Heat Enable

parameter.name: config_79_1
parameter.label: 79: 2nd Stage Cool Enable
parameter.description: 2nd Stage Cool Enable

parameter.name: config_132_1
parameter.label: 132: Run Schedule
parameter.description: Run Schedule<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet to 1 if running schedule (RUN is displayed on the thermostat screen).</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_137_1
parameter.label: 137: Backlight Timeout
parameter.description: Backlight Timeout<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtBacklight Timeout is the time (in seconds) from the last button press to the backlight going out. </p&gt <p&gtThe time-out can be set between 0 and 120 seconds. </p&gt <p&gtWhen set to 0, the backlight will remain always on.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_141_1
parameter.label: 141: Screen Timeout
parameter.description: Screen Timeout<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis is the time before any screen reverts to the Minimized Screen (temperature display only), after you stop pushing buttons. </p&gt <p&gtMinimized Screen feature is disabled by setting this time to 0</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_143_1
parameter.label: 143: Sensor (Internal) Offset
parameter.description: Sensor (Internal) Offset<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe internal temperature sensor can be calibrated to report values different from its actual reading. The offset can range from -7 degrees to +7 degrees.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_148_1
parameter.label: 148: Screen Contrast
parameter.description: Screen Contrast<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe Screen Contrast sets the contrast level of the LCD display.</p&gt <p&gtThe contrast can be set between 0 and 20. If the display is too light, use a higher number. If dark lines appear on the screen, use a lower number</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_185_1
parameter.label: 185: Schedule Enable
parameter.description: Schedule Enable<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen enabled (set to 1), the local thermostat's scheduler function is enabled.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_228_4
parameter.label: 228: Schedule Sun-1
parameter.description: Schedule Sun-1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the first schedule setpoints for Sundays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gt Byte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x06004643 06:00AM 70F / 67F</p&gt <p&gt 0x06001519 06:00AM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_229_4
parameter.label: 229: Schedule Sun-2
parameter.description: Schedule Sun-2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the second schedule setpoints for Sundays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)<br /&gt</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x08003e55 08:00AM 62F / 85F</p&gt <p&gt 0x0800101d 08:00AM 16C / 29C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_230_4
parameter.label: 230: Schedule Sun-3
parameter.description: Schedule Sun-3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the third schedule setpoints for Sundays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x1200464e 06:00PM 70F / 78F</p&gt <p&gt 0x12001519 06:00PM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_231_4
parameter.label: 231: Schedule Sun-4
parameter.description: Schedule Sun-4<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the fourth schedule setpoints for Sundays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x16003e52 10:00PM 62F / 82F</p&gt <p&gt 0x1600101b 10:00PM 16C / 27C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_232_4
parameter.label: 232: Schedule Mon-1
parameter.description: Schedule Mon-1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the first schedule setpoints for Mondays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x06004643 06:00AM 70F / 67F</p&gt <p&gt 0x06001519 06:00AM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_233_4
parameter.label: 233: Schedule Mon-2
parameter.description: Schedule Mon-2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the second schedule setpoints for Mondays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x08003e55 08:00AM 62F / 85F<br /&gt</p&gt <p&gt 0x0800101d 08:00AM 16C / 29C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_234_4
parameter.label: 234: Schedule Mon-3
parameter.description: Schedule Mon-3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the third schedule setpoints for Mondays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x1200464e 06:00PM 70F / 78F</p&gt <p&gt 0x12001519 06:00PM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_235_4
parameter.label: 235: Schedule Mon-4
parameter.description: Schedule Mon-4<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the fourth schedule setpoints for Mondays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x16003e52 10:00PM 62F / 82F</p&gt <p&gt 0x1600101b 10:00PM 16C / 27C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 236: Schedule Tue-1
parameter.description: Schedule Tue-1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the first schedule setpoints for Tuesdays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x06004643 06:00AM 70F / 67F</p&gt <p&gt 0x06001519 06:00AM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: Schedule Tue-2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the second schedule setpoints for Tuesdays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gt Default: 0x08003e55 08:00AM 62F / 85F</p&gt <p&gt 0x0800101d 08:00AM 16C / 29C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: Schedule Fri-4<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the fourth schedule setpoints for Fridays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x16003e52 10:00PM 62F / 82F</p&gt <p&gt 0x1600101b 10:00PM 16C / 27C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 252: Schedule Sat-1
parameter.description: Schedule Sat-1<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the first schedule setpoints for Saturdays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x06004643 06:00AM 70F / 67F</p&gt <p&gt 0x06001519 06:00AM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_253_4
parameter.label: 253: Schedule Sat-2
parameter.description: Schedule Sat-2<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the second schedule setpoints for Saturdays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x08003e55 08:00AM 62F / 85F</p&gt <p&gt 0x0800101d 08:00AM 16C / 29C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_254_4
parameter.label: 254: Schedule Sat-3
parameter.description: Schedule Sat-3<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the third schedule setpoints for Saturdays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x1200464e 06:00PM 70F / 78F</p&gt <p&gt 0x12001519 06:00PM 21C / 25C</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_255_4
parameter.label: 255: Schedule Sat-4
parameter.description: Schedule Sat-4<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis value holds information about the fourth schedule setpoints for Saturdays.</p&gt <ul&gt<li&gtByte 1: Hour (0-23)</li&gt <li&gtByte 2: Minute (0-59)</li&gt <li&gtByte 3: Heat Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt <li&gtByte 4: Cool Setpoint (degrees)</li&gt </ul&gt<p&gtDefault: 0x16003e52 10:00PM 62F / 82F</p&gt <p&gt 0x1600101b 10:00PM 16C / 27C</p&gt</p&gt
